bibl.title: Eight Greek Tax Receipts from Elephantine.
bibl.note: The 8 ostraca come from Elephantine and are dated to the 1st and 2nd centuries. All of them are housed in the Egyptian Museum in Cairo under S.R. 18955. - 1. Monthly Trade Tax, 10 May AD 66. - 2. Receipt for Poll Tax and for δεσμοφυλακία, 29 Oct. - 27 Nov. AD 115. - 3. Receipt for Supporting the Guards of the Harbor, AD 98-117. - 4. Monthly Trade Tax, 27 Nov. - 26 Dec. AD 120. - 5. Receipt for λαογραφία, δεσμοφυλακία and μερισμὸς ἐπικεφαλίου ἀνακεχωρηκότων, AD 130. - 6. Receipt for Trade Tax, 3 June AD 148. - 7. Receipt for Unspecified μερισμοί, AD 173-175. - 8. Receipt for μερισμὸς ἀνδρῶν ἀνακεχωκηκότων, 6 Oct. AD 183.
bibl.seg: Shereen A. Aly, Eight Greek Tax Receipts from Elephantine.

The 8 ostraca come from Elephantine and are dated to the 1st and 2nd centuries. All of them are housed in the Egyptian Museum in Cairo under S.R. 18955. - 1. Monthly Trade Tax, 10 May AD 66. - 2. Receipt for Poll Tax and for δεσμοφυλακία, 29 Oct. - 27 Nov. AD 115. - 3. Receipt for Supporting the Guards of the Harbor, AD 98-117. - 4. Monthly Trade Tax, 27 Nov. - 26 Dec. AD 120. - 5. Receipt for λαογραφία, δεσμοφυλακία and μερισμὸς ἐπικεφαλίου ἀνακεχωρηκότων, AD 130. - 6. Receipt for Trade Tax, 3 June AD 148. - 7. Receipt for Unspecified μερισμοί, AD 173-175. - 8. Receipt for μερισμὸς ἀνδρῶν ἀνακεχωκηκότων, 6 Oct. AD 183.
